nodes.text: Spined snakes, also called spined vipers, were snakes native to Lok. They lived hiding among the rocks and sand of the deserts of their homeworld. These predator snakes had venomous spikes along the top ridge of its body and only hunted at daytime. Spined snakes existed in several sizes and varieties. Known variants included giant spined snakes, sandy spined snakes and spined snake recluses.
